title: HELP! How do I install correctly?
body:
Just got back from my holiday and tried to install the alpha, the install went correctly (apart from popping up with this 1 message) and i was able to get into the client, but it did not create an icon on my computer, so once i exit the client i cant get back onto it again.

can anyone offer any ideas on how i can get the icon link?

replies.body:
The best help I can offer is completely  uninstalling the alpha client and reinstalling :/

Best of luck
